path: To Be Organized/Graphic Maintenance Quick Reference/vprod 31 32/VProd.docx
text: The Cisco ACI network used for new control rooms 31/32/etc. is not accessible directly from the corporate network. To see machines and IP addresses on the network, go to vprod.io in your browser and select Production, then the appropriate control room. Only use this as a reference and do not reset anything from here. You can remote into one of the jump box machines, and from there, remote into the ACI network devices to troubleshoot, or use the RDM app, logging in with vprod credentials. vprod RDM Jumpboxes 100.113.82.86 100.113.82.87 100.113.82.88
